## Module DOM.File

Types for the [W3C File API](http://dev.w3.org/2006/webapi/FileAPI/).

#### `File`

``` purescript
data File :: *
```

A `File` object instance.

#### `FileList`

``` purescript
data FileList :: *
```

A `FileList` object instance.

#### `FileReader`

``` purescript
data FileReader :: *
```

A `FileReader` object instance.

#### `Blob`

``` purescript
data Blob :: *
```

A `Blob` object instance.
